UD_Patcher_ModPreset
Scriptname UD_Patcher_ModPreset extends ReferenceAlias Hidden
DisplayName
String Property DisplayName = "General Preset" Auto

Name of the preset visible on the MCM page

DataStr_Easy
String Property DataStr_Easy Auto

Easiest DataStr configuration when adding a modifier with the Patcher

DataStr_Ground
String Property DataStr_Ground Auto

Medium DataStr configuration when adding a modifier with the Patcher (Silly name to be displayed in the correct order)

DataStr_Hard
String Property DataStr_Hard Auto

Hardest DataStr configuration when adding a modifier with the Patcher

DataStr_Types
String Property DataStr_Types Auto

Types of the parameters in configurations

Form1_Variants
FormList Property Form1_Variants Auto

List of possible values for the DataForm1 when adding a modifier with the Patcher.  The easiest options come first.

Form2_Variants
FormList Property Form2_Variants Auto

List of possible values for the DataForm2 when adding a modifier with the Patcher.  The easiest options come first.

Form3_Variants
FormList Property Form3_Variants Auto

List of possible values for the DataForm3 when adding a modifier with the Patcher.  The easiest options come first.

Form4_Variants
FormList Property Form4_Variants Auto

List of possible values for the DataForm4 when adding a modifier with the Patcher.  The easiest options come first.

Form5_Variants
FormList Property Form5_Variants Auto

List of possible values for the DataForm5 when adding a modifier with the Patcher.  The easiest options come first.

PreferredDevices
Keyword[] Property PreferredDevices Auto

This preset is exclusive to devices with any of the specified keywords

ForbiddenDevices
Keyword[] Property ForbiddenDevices Auto

This preset is not compatible with devices with any of the specified keywords

ConflictedDeviceModTags
String[] Property ConflictedDeviceModTags Auto

Modifier tags on the device that conflict with this preset

ConflictedGlobalModTags
String[] Property ConflictedGlobalModTags Auto

Modifier tags on all worn devices that conflict with this preset

RequiredDeviceModTags
String[] Property RequiredDeviceModTags Auto

Modifier tags on the device that needed by this preset

ApplicableToNPC
Bool Property ApplicableToNPC = True Auto

Indicates that this modifier can be applied to devices on NPCs

ApplicableToPlayer
Bool Property ApplicableToPlayer = True Auto

Indicates that this modifier can be applied to devices on the Player

BaseProbability
Float Property BaseProbability = 100.0 Auto

Base probability of applying this modifier

IsAbsoluteProbability
Bool Property IsAbsoluteProbability = False Auto

An indication that the above probability is absolute, i.e. it does not depend on the number of registered modifiers or the settings for the number of modifiers on the devices.

To fulfill the boundary conditions I need, the probabilities can be of two kinds: - absolute probability - the chance of a modifier appearing does not depend on the total number of registered modifiers, or the allowed number on one device.  - weighted (relative, normalized) probability - modifiers with this type of probability compete with each other for a chance to appear on a device. This chance naturally decreases as the number of registered modifiers increases, and directly depends on the number of possible modifiers on one device.

Boundary conditions: - A modifier with an absolute probability of 100% will ALWAYS appear on suitable devices.  - A modifier with a weighted probability of 50% will appear 2 times less often on devices than a modifier with a weighted probability of 100%.

BaseSeverity
Float Property BaseSeverity = 0.0 Auto

Average modifier severity (mathematical expectation of the random variable on which the configuration is generated)

SeverityDispersion
Float Property SeverityDispersion = 0.20 Auto

Severity dispersion

OccupiedSlots
Int Property OccupiedSlots = 1 Auto

Number of occupied slots

GetModifier
UD_Modifier Function GetModifier()

Returns modifier for this patcher preset. The preset is bound to the same alias as the modifier

Returns

Modifier

GetDataStr
String Function GetDataStr(
Float afGlobalSeverityShift = 0.0,
Float afGlobalSeverityDispersionMult = 1.0
)

Forms a string with parameters for the modifier. Takes into account global difficulty settings and difficulty variance settings.  It uses values from DataStr_Easy, DataStr_Ground and DataStr_Hard as references.

Parameters
afGlobalSeverityShift
Float

Difficulty shift.

afGlobalSeverityDispersionMult
Float

Difficulty dispersion multiplier.

Returns

String with parameters

CheckWearerCompatibility
Int Function CheckWearerCompatibility(
Actor akActor
)

Checks the actor against the requirements of the preset.

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor

Returns
-1

the actor does not meet the requirements

1

the actor meets the requirements

CheckDeviceCompatibility
Int Function CheckDeviceCompatibility(
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript akDevice,
Bool abCheckWearer = True
)

Checks the device against the requirements of the preset.

Parameters
akDevice
UD_CustomDevice_RenderScript

Device

abCheckWearer
Bool

To check out wearer

Returns
-3

wearer does not meet the requirements

-2

device is forbidden for this preset

-1

preset has preferred devices but this device is not one of them

1

device is compatible

2

device is preferred for this preset

CheckTagsCompatibility
Int Function CheckTagsCompatibility(
String[] aasDeviceModsTags,
String[] aasWearerModsTags
)

Checks if the preset is compatible with tags (from existing modifiers) on the device or wearer

Parameters
aasDeviceModsTags
String[]

tags of modifiers on this device

aasWearerModsTags
String[]

tags of all worn devices modifiers

Returns
-2

device has a conflicting modifier

-1

wearer has a devcie with conflicting modifier

0

device does not have the required tag

1

preset is compatible
